original_text: Then I saw a wild animal that was coming up out of the sea. It had ten horns and there was a crown on each horn. The animal also had seven heads. On each head there was a bad name that insulted God.
korean_text: 내가 보니 바다에서 한 짐승이 나오는데 뿔이 열이요 머리가 일곱이라 그 뿔에는 열 왕관이 있고 그 머리들에는 신성 모독 하는 이름들이 있더라

sentences.original_text: Then I saw a wild animal
that was coming up out of the sea

sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 열 개의 뿔을 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and there was a crown on each horn
The animal also had seven heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그 짐승은 또한 일곱 개의 머리를 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: On each head there was a bad name
